Get raw data from previous sessions

get_raw_data_prev_session.Rd

This function gets any sessions occuring before the latest session of a seatrack GLS logger and collects the associated raw data files into a zip file. The zip file also contains a CSV with metadata about the previous sessions.

Usage

get_raw_data_prev_session(
  logger_serial_nos = c(),
  zip_filename = paste0("raw_data_", Sys.Date(), ".zip"),
  search_path = NULL
)

Arguments

logger_serial_nos

A character vector of logger serial numbers to get previous session data for.

zip_filename

The name of the output zip file. Defaults to "raw_data_<current_date>.zip".

search_path

The path to search for raw data files. If NULL, defaults to the "ALL" folder in the SeaTrack database imports directory.

Value

None, but exports a zip file containing the raw data files and a metadata CSV.

Details

This history is useful when a manufacturer is attempting to recover data from a nonresponsive logger.
